extendedInfo.description: *NEW!* EPIC UPDATE: Experience the unbelievable New Campaign and Raids in the Desert Kingdom! Earn reputation and unlock brand new items on THE ARENA. CRAFT amazing items using the new PROFESSIONS system. New buildings, contracts, workshops and expansions await!Facebook Community: http://www.facebook.com/RuleKingdomGame Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?&v=T-EQm9c8au0Rule the Kingdom: fantastic RPG action, city building, farming and storytelling!An epic RPG adventure awaits you in Rule the Kingdom! Outfit your character, train your loyal band of warriors and join the battle against trolls, skeletons and other baddies to save the empire from evil! Build homes for your workers, produce goods in your workshops, fortify your stronghold, and farm crops to feed your subjects in your quest to build a thriving kingdom!*MORE*Rule the Kingdom is an unprecedented blend of RPG action, arena fighting, city building, farming and storytelling!- Win thousands of battles with your loyal troops, defeat legendary foes, slice and smash your way through their minions while an amazing storyline unfolds through thousands of quests!- Experience the ARENA! Earn reputation and unlock unique items!- Master the new gathering professions and CRAFT amazing items!- Learn arcane battle magic and unleash dozens of screen-shattering spells upon your enemies!- Train your squad of hearty warriors who will remain loyal to the very end!- Enhance your heroâs battle prowess with hundreds of unique items and forbidden potions!- Craft legendary artifacts to help smite even the deadliest foes!- Rebuild your lost kingdom: construct dozens of productive buildings and help your subjects as their wise and kind ruler!- Take charge of production on one of your many farms for your kingdom to thrive; order your subjects to gather resources, such as wood, stone and oils to keep your kingdom growing!- Face the many dangers lurking in the dark corners of the Empire; battle through lush forests, scorching deserts and snow-blasted tundra to become a true hero of the empire!Download it now to experience fantasy RPG action and satisfying city building excitement!Privacy Policy  - http://www.game-insight.com/legal/privacy/

reviews.title: New update is another step down
reviews.comment: Latest update doesn\'t even download, prior update made it so the game doesn\'t open, one before that tried making me start over or drop 2 levels. Great scheme to rob those of us that have paid real money in the original versions of the game.
reviews.author: Aaron Jensen

reviews.title: RPG
reviews.comment: The latest update totally ruined the game.... It\'s impossible to play anymore. The game simply refuses to load and when it does load it kind of freezes between screens with no option available. My device is an Asus Transform and i never had problems with the game before.
reviews.author: Mihai Miki

reviews.title: Good game. Need more money coming in
reviews.comment: The money is so crap need more money from quests. It\'s got to wait ages to do any thing upgrade or buy stuff. But other then that great game
reviews.author: ANTHONY POORE

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great game.. Keep it up guys..
reviews.author: Wawan Setiawan

reviews.title: PVP NOT WORKING
reviews.comment: after doing the quest for PVP , when i try to refresh the opponents, it says \"You need to be online to use this feature. Check your internet connection and try again.\" i mean, im playing at my house, and i even disconnected my internet and used 4g instead, thinking it could fix the game. but still the same result. how am i supposed to get the pvp set if ill be stuck on a rank 1 Valor... please fix it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: But diffuct is find crystals without money                Aaaaah...?
reviews.author: Salman raja

reviews.title: Newest Update
reviews.comment: This new update has reduced the stability! Everytime I load my game I\'m back to the same position I was about 6 days ago. So I haven\'t been able to move the game forward. Please fix this, it\'s getting annoying now.
reviews.author: Sandra Nimako - Boatey

reviews.title: New update...
reviews.comment: Since the new update it won\'t even open on my Samsung Galaxy tablet! I get a black screen & then it goes right back to home screen! Not happy @ all! I really enjoyed this game too before this last update! :-(
reviews.author: Carissa Daniels

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love it. Addicted. ., Uninstall and re install 3 times due to force close. update pls.
reviews.author: Philip Cerrada

reviews.title: The new update suck
reviews.comment: The new update make me start all over again. Uninstall .

reviews.comment: Awesome apps

reviews.comment: I liked this game a lot I spent money in it put a lot of time in it now it won\'t even open useless

reviews.title: Dumb
reviews.comment: I thought this might be a fun game, but it was truly stupid. Try again.

reviews.title: Seriously buggy
reviews.comment: I need to upgrade my stronghold because my population is full, but I can\'t upgrade it because I don\'t have any free people to do it.

reviews.comment: i like this game alot. but it needs an update.

reviews.title: Major issues to be fixxed
reviews.comment: I\'ve spent money for what doesn\'t register my daily logins.freezes up.not enough time for a lot of the side missions they give us. I would give five star\'s when and if fixxed soon.otherwise they can pay back me all money\'s spent.
